sentences.en: Deserters and dissidents would be summarily executed.
sentences.cn: 这些内容都原原本本被记录了下来.

sentences.en: Furthermore, the character of advanced steel products and the development of manufacturing technology were summarily recommended.
sentences.cn: 在此基础上, 简要介绍了先进钢铁材料的特征及生产制造技术进展.

sentences.en: He was summarily dismissed from his job.
I only read the article summarily.
sentences.cn: 我只是简单地看了看那篇文章.

sentences.en: If caught, the men could be summarily shot as spies.
sentences.cn: 这些人一旦被抓就可能当作间谍立即处决.

sentences.en: Method To review summarily the clinical symptoms from 55 patients with AIH.
sentences.cn: 方法回顾性总结55例自身免疫性肝炎患者的临床资料.

sentences.en: Please explain the main points summarily.

sentences.cn: 请把你的看法概括地讲一讲.

sentences.en: Several detainees had been summarily executed.
sentences.cn: 几个在押犯被草草处决。

sentences.en: The paper on this subject summarily.
sentences.cn: 本文对这一课题作了概要的阐述.

sentences.en: The suspected spy was summarily executed.
sentences.cn: 这个间谍嫌犯被立即处决了.

sentences.en: They were summarily ejected by the security guard.
sentences.cn: 他们立刻被保安赶了出来.

sentences.en: With this decision, he summarily eliminated many of the products that would have made us competitive.
sentences.cn: 根据这个决定, 他急急忙忙地一笔勾销了许多本来会使我们具有竞争力的产品.

trans.tran_cn: 概括地，即刻地，简单（化）地，草率地
trans.tran_en: immediately, and without following the normal process
